Text: The Dark Knight Rises:  Featuring the DC Comics character Batman, the film is the final installment in Nolan's "Batman" film trilogy, and the sequel to "Batman Begins" (2005) and "The Dark Knight" (2008).

Text: The Dark Knight Rises:  Christian Bale reprises the lead role of Bruce Wayne/Batman, with a returning cast of allies: Michael Caine as Alfred Pennyworth, Gary Oldman as James Gordon, and Morgan Freeman as Lucius Fox.
